text: læa hak phwk cea hwan kerng kar tækyæk rahwang khea thang sxng k cng sng phu tadsin khn hnung cak khrxbkhraw khxng fay chay læa phu tadsin xik khn hnung cak khrxbkhraw fay hying hak thang sxng prarthna hı mi kar pranipranxm kan læw xallxhˌ k ca thrng hı khwam sarec nı rahwang thang sxng mæ cring xallxhˌ pen phuthrng rxbru phuthrng saphphayyu
